demos.prompt:
[{'content': "You are a helpful assistant that answers in JSON. Here's the json schema you must adhere to:
<schema>
{'title': 'RestaurantReservation', 'type': 'object', 'properties': {'reservationID': {'title': 'Reservation ID', 'type': 'string'}, 'guestName': {'title': 'Guest Name', 'type': 'string'}, 'reservationTime': {'title': 'Reservation Time', 'type': 'string', 'format': 'date-time'}, 'specialRequests': {'title': 'Special Requests', 'type': 'array', 'items': {'type': 'string'}}}, 'required': ['reservationID', 'guestName', 'reservationTime']}
</schema>
", 'role': 'system'}, {'content': "I'd like to make a reservation at The Gourmet Bistro for my anniversary dinner. The reservation is for two people under the name Alexander Hamilton. We're planning to dine on April 15th, 2023, at 7:30 PM. Additionally, we would like a table by the window and a note to the chef that we'll be celebrating a special occasion, so a surprise dessert would be wonderful. The reservation ID is AH-158394.", 'role': 'user'}]
demos.rationale:
```json
{
  "reservationID": "AH-158394",
  "guestName": "Alexander Hamilton",
  "reservationTime": "2023-04-15T19:30:00Z",
  "specialRequests": [
    "Table by the window",
    "Surprise dessert for a special occasion"
  ]
}
```
demos.completion:
```json
{
  "reservationID": "AH-158394",
  "guestName": "Alexander Hamilton",
  "reservationTime": "2023-04-15T19:30:00Z",

    "Table by the window",
    "Surprise dessert for a special occasion"
  ]
}
```

demos.prompt:
[{'content': "You are a helpful assistant that answers in JSON. Here's the json schema you must adhere to:
<schema>
{'title': 'CustomerExperienceData', 'type': 'object', 'properties': {'customerID': {'title': 'Customer ID', 'type': 'string'}, 'feedbackScore': {'title': 'Feedback Score', 'type': 'integer', 'minimum': 1, 'maximum': 5}, 'comments': {'title': 'Comments', 'type': 'string'}}, 'required': ['customerID', 'feedbackScore']}
</schema>
", 'role': 'system'}, {'content': "Please create a JSON object for our customer experience management system. We need to record the feedback from our latest customer interaction. The customer's ID is 'CUST29382', they gave us a feedback score of 4 out of 5, and their comment was 'The service was very prompt and professional, but I wish there was more variety in the product options.'", 'role': 'user'}]
demos.rationale:
```json

{

  "customerID": "CUST29382",

  "feedbackScore": 4,

  "comments": "The service was very prompt and professional, but I wish there was more variety in the product options."

}

```

demos.prompt:
[{'content': "You are a helpful assistant that answers in JSON. Here's the json schema you must adhere to:
<schema>
{'properties': {'sku': {'title': 'SKU', 'type': 'string'}, 'productName': {'title': 'Product Name', 'type': 'string'}, 'newStockLevel': {'title': 'New Stock Level', 'type': 'integer'}, 'restockDate': {'title': 'Restock Date', 'type': 'string', 'format': 'date'}}, 'required': ['sku', 'productName', 'newStockLevel'], 'title': 'InventoryUpdate', 'type': 'object'}
</schema>
", 'role': 'system'}, {'content': "I am currently updating our retail store's inventory system and need to construct a JSON object for each item that requires an update. For a specific product, the SKU is 'ABC123', the product name is 'UltraBoost Running Shoes', the new stock level is 25 units, and the restock date is scheduled for April 15, 2023. Please provide me with a valid JSON object that adheres to the schema for an inventory update.", 'role': 'user'}]

demos.json_schema: {"properties": {"driverName": {"title": "Driver Name", "type": "string"}, "vehicleMake": {"title": "Vehicle Make", "type": "string"}, "vehicleModel": {"title": "Vehicle Model", "type": "string"}, "yearOfManufacture": {"title": "Year of Manufacture", "type": "integer"}, "drivingHistory": {"title": "Driving History", "type": "object", "properties": {"incidents": {"type": "array", "items": {"type": "string"}}, "yearsLicensed": {"type": "integer"}}}}, "required": ["driverName", "vehicleMake", "vehicleModel", "yearOfManufacture", "drivingHistory"], "title": "CarInsuranceQuote", "type": "object"}
demos.prompt:
[{'content': "You are a helpful assistant that answers in JSON. Here's the json schema you must adhere to:
<schema>
{'properties': {'driverName': {'title': 'Driver Name', 'type': 'string'}, 'vehicleMake': {'title': 'Vehicle Make', 'type': 'string'}, 'vehicleModel': {'title': 'Vehicle Model', 'type': 'string'}, 'yearOfManufacture': {'title': 'Year of Manufacture', 'type': 'integer'}, 'drivingHistory': {'title': 'Driving History', 'type': 'object', 'properties': {'incidents': {'type': 'array', 'items': {'type': 'string'}}, 'yearsLicensed': {'type': 'integer'}}}}, 'required': ['driverName', 'vehicleMake', 'vehicleModel', 'yearOfManufacture', 'drivingHistory'], 'title': 'CarInsuranceQuote', 'type': 'object'}
</schema>
", 'role': 'system'}, {'content': "Hello, I am looking to get a quote for car insurance and need to create a JSON object with my details. My name is Emily Thompson, I drive a Ford Focus, the model is SE Hatch, and it was manufactured in 2019. I have a clean driving history with no incidents, and I've been licensed for 10 years. Could you please assist me by providing a JSON object that includes my driver name, vehicle make, vehicle model, year of manufacture, and driving history?", 'role': 'user'}]

predictor.signature_instructions:
```json
{
  "prefix": "To construct a structured JSON object, start by identifying the main elements and key-value pairs in the text.",
  "extract_information": "Parse the given text for critical data points, categorizing them into appropriate keys like 'name', 'age', 'occupation', etc. In cases where information is unstructured, deduce meaningful tags to organize it within your JSON structure.",
  "validate_data": "Ensure all values adhere to their expected formats (e.g., alphanumeric for names, numerical for ages). Disregard extraneous content that does not contribute to the main objective of data representation.",
  "create_json_object": "Compose a valid JSON object encapsulating all relevant information in key-value pairs as cleanly as possible while avoiding unnecessary whitespace or newline characters.",
}
```
